comments:
I2004-03-23-08:00

With my regular (old) workspace.

1) Select a couple of projects, all shared via extssh at dev.eclipse.org
(org.eclipse.jdt.ui, etc)
2) select team->synchronize from the context menu
3) presss ok in the dialog comes up
4) observe an exception in the console (not in the log).
